showAnvilUses.name: Show anvil uses
showAnvilUses.description: Displays the amount of anvils uses of an item in its tooltip.

discSignalStrength.name: Disc signal strength
discSignalStrength.description: Displays the redstone strength of the disc.

explorerMapCoordinates.name: Show explorer map coordinates
explorerMapCoordinates.description: Displays the coordinates of a explorer map.

showSuspiciousStewEffect.name: Show suspicious stew effect
showSuspiciousStewEffect.description: Displays the effect type and duration of a suspicious stew.

showDurability.name: Show durability
showDurability.description: Shows the durability of an item when advanced tooltip is turned off.

showCommandBlockCommand.name: Show command block command
showCommandBlockCommand.description: When the command block was saved with nbt data, it will display the saved command.

showSignText.name: Show sign text lines
showSignText.description: When enabled shows the lines of an sign, if nbt data is saved.

tooltipTextColor.name: Text color
tooltipTextColor.description: Set the color of the tooltip text.

foodLevel.name: Show food level
foodLevel.description: Displays the nutrition of a food item in its tooltip.

showArmorBarIcons.name: Show armor bar icons
showArmorBarIcons.description: Displays the armor bars of a armor item in its tooltip.

saturationLevel.name: Show saturation level
saturationLevel.description:
Displays the saturation of a food item in its tooltip.

Current: Displays the level of saturation reached after eating.
Maximum: Displays the maximum possible saturation level of a food.

displayItemData.name: Show item data
displayItemData.description:
<= 1.20.4: Display NBT data of an item stack.
>= 1.20.5: Display components of an item stack.

printWithNbtArrayData.name: Show NBT array data
printWithNbtArrayData.description: Display values inside of an NBT array.

expandComponents.name: Expand Components
expandComponents.description: Expand lists/objects of a component when they are collapsed.
